name: Dusty At Home
summary: In this game you play as the little potato man, Dusty. He is a really chill and relaxed streamer, but things are gonna change for him. He is gonna fight himself trough a set of nightmares a which originated from his brothers disappearance. You have to survive 7 nightmares and after there is a custom night with challenges. There even are multiple endings to this game.
